name: WebSequenceDiagrams
author: Joel Vandal

sections.description:
This plugin will add button to TinyMCE Visual Editor which when clicked will append shortcode for WebSequenceDiagrams.

Arbitrary section

Features

  1. Simple plugin.
  2. Easy to use and simple shortcode.
  3. Button to add shortcode to your post while editing, so need to remember them because they are in front of you!
sections.installation:
1. Upload wsd folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is the 1st version of the plugin.
